Detailed Description

This iterator iterates over a constant value. for a given amount of steps.

m_sample_count_type  count
) 
 

This iterator will iterate over 'value' count times.

Parameters:
value An m_value_type that holds the value
count An m_sample_count_type that holds the number of times to iterate
